name: ButtonBass EDM Cube
description: This is the  ButtonBass EDM Cube. Mix EDM beats with the click of a mouse.  Click the black banner to load the sounds then click a cube to start a beat. Click multiple cubes to layer beats into a song. The beats are in sync automatically as you click each cube.   You may need space in the room you are in as you might get up and dance.. Enjoy! If you want more cubes like this you should visit us at ButtonBass.com
